title: Wordstock
body: A multipurpose Translator/Dictionary application built around My Memory translation and Words Api's. The original intention of the application was to not only be able to translate to other languages, but use the dictionary functionality to understand the context behind a word. Currently collaborating with one of the other group members that was in charge of css to give it a fresher appearance and add responsiveness. My role during this project was managing the api calls and handling the front-end javascript wiring.
tech: Initially: html, css, and javascript with ajax for the api calls. Added a small express server for Heroku deployment and api key protection via env variables.

title: Designer Delve
body: An app designed for freelance artists to submit their artwork and be found. When they submit their artwork they have the option of including their Facebook and LinkedIn as means of contact. Users can also search a variety of mediums and by state. My role consisted of database/schema, wiring front-end, handlebars integration, and some styling touch-ups to give it more responsiveness and a cohesive appearance.
tech: Node/Express, MySql, Cloudinary for image hosting and url generation, Greensock (GSAP), Jquery, and Handlebars

title: Scraps
body: A short trivia game themed around Jeopardy with Jeff Goldblum quotes as the trivia questions. This application was not made with mobile responsiveness in mind.

title: Penny
body: Survey app that matches you with other users based on survey score.
